name: Interwoven (Pinelark Nerd)
description:
A game where you play a postal worker collecting and delivering mail.

All of the art assets, sound and code were made between 10th and 19th June 2022 as part of the Lost Relic Games Community Game Jam.

v0.1.1 is a very basic proof of concept and only has collecting mail. Much of the map hasn't been created yet (I ran out of time!) The game was designed in the Godot Engine (v3.4.4).

I am a one-person developer and for this game jam, I wanted to focus on my weakest area: artwork. I spent the majority of the week putting together a 16-bit pixelart tileset.

Thanks! --Pinelark Nerd
